author: vhennebert
msg: - NPE when break-before is set on the first row of a table with headers
- NPE when break-after is set on the last row of a table with headers or footers
- Invalid break class exception when break-after is set on the last block of a cell in the last row of a table
- double page break when break-before is set both on a table and its first row

author: jdcasey
msg: removing ArtifactRepositoryPolicy constants in favor of hard-coded strings, to remove a dep on maven-artifact and all it's dependencies...these are public contract anyway.
